title: WTB: Elmer Flick T206s w/different backs
author: Angyale

posts.post_title: WTB: Elmer Flick T206s w/different backs
posts.post_content:
Trying to put together a complete back run.  Looking for vg+ to ex/mt cards with decent eye appeal (raw or graded).  Hoping for reasonably well centered cards with no creases or wrinkles.  Still need Old Mill, Hindu, Sovereign 150, Piedmont 350, and both Sweet Caporal Factory 25 (150 & 350).  Send me an email and LMK what you have and what you're asking price is.  I also have several cards for trade including some Old Judges.  Thanks,

Eric
Eangyal @ roadrunner.com

Picked up a few, still need six more.  Thanks in advanced.

Angyale

Still looking.  Paying strong prices for nice cards.

Angyale
